peril.controllers

Interface AIController

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AIHandler

    public interface AIController
    The API for all AI interactions with the game. This API is unable to directly change any aspects of the game but it does serve as proxy between the AI and the user controlled Players.
    Since:
    2018-02-21
    Version:
    1.01.04
    Author:
    Joshua_Eddy

    • Method Detail

      • getBoard

        Board getBoard()
        Retrieves the Board.
        Returns:
        <Board Returns the board.

      • select

        boolean select(Country country)
        Selects the Country from the current state.
        Parameters:
        country - Country to select.
        Returns:
        Whether or not the Country was selected.

      • forEachCountry

        void forEachCountry(java.util.function.Consumer<Country> task)
        Performs a Consumer function on all the Countrys on the Board.
        Parameters:
        task - Consumer of type Country.

      • reinforce

        void reinforce()
        Reinforces the Country selected using select(Country) with one unit.

      • attack

        void attack()
        Performs an attack from the first Country to the second Country that was selected using select(Country). This method also handles hiding an showing the UI elements of combat.

        This method will throw exceptions in the following scenarios:
        • The games current state is not 'Combat'.
        • There is not two countries selected using select(Country).

      • fortify

        void fortify()
        Fortifies the second Country with one unit from the first Country to that was selected using select(Country).
        This method will throw exceptions in the following scenarios:
        • The games current state is not 'Fortify'.
        • There is not two countries selected using select(Country).

      • isPathBetween

        boolean isPathBetween(Country a,
                      Country b)
        A pre-check for fortify(), this retrieves whether or not there is a valid path between two Countrys owned by the same Player.
        Parameters:
        a - The first Country
        b - The second Country
        Returns:
        boolean

      • clearSelected

        void clearSelected()
        Clears the currently selected Country(s) from all the states.

      • getCurrentPlayer

        Player getCurrentPlayer()
        Retrieves the current Player.
        Returns:

      • forEachEnemyNeighbour

        void forEachEnemyNeighbour(Country country,
                           java.util.function.Consumer<Country> task)

        Parameters:

        task - Consumer

      • getPoints

        Points getPoints()
        Retrieves all the point reward values for actions in the game.
        Returns:

      • tradeUnit

        boolean tradeUnit(Country country,
                  Unit unit)
        Converts as many of the Units from this Army into the Unit above in terms of strength. If no Units were traded then this method will return false;
        Parameters:
        unit - Specified Unit to trade up.
        country - The Country containing the unit.
        Returns:
        Whether or not any Units were traded up.

      • hasOpenLinkBetween

        boolean hasOpenLinkBetween(Country country,
                           Country neighbour)
        Retrieves whether the link between two Countrys is open.
        Parameters:
        country - The Country that is will be the source of the traversal.
        neighbour - The Country that is will be the destination of the traversal.
        Returns:
        Whether the link between two Countrys is open.

      • createBlockade

        void createBlockade(Country source,
                    Country neighbour)
        Creates a blockade that prevents the neighbour Country from transferring units to the source Country. This also prevents attack from the neighbour however the source can still attack the neighbour. Blockades last 3 rounds.
        Parameters:
        source - The Country that is will be the source of the blockade.
        neighbour - The Country that is will be blocked from transferring units.

      • getUnitAbove

        Unit getUnitAbove(Unit unit)
        Retrieves the Unit above the specified Unit in terms of strength.
        Parameters:
        unit - The Unit above the specifed unit in terms of strength.
        Returns:
        Unit
